website_summaries.verdict: A gift-worthy option, regardless of whether you give the entire set to a crafty friend or make the candles yourself and gift them one by one. A satisfying project for adults or parents and children.
pros: Includes all the elements necessary to make 6 scented candles
Natural beeswax delivers a clean, healthy burn
Attractive packaging, cute candle holders, and quality individual components make this an impressive gift
cons: Close parental supervision is a must if children wish to take part

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing I loved everything except the thermometer. It was broken. The battery was corroded along with the metal parts inside the thermometer. Everything else was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Small kit
customer_reviews.text: The melting pot is pretty small. The gauge metal is good, and the measuring lines are nice to have. The rest of the kit is all small accessory style tryout stuff. Bang for the buck is the killer for me I guess. If you just want to one and done and don't have any idea where to start on candle making, (i.e. go to YouTube and learn about it first) then I guess this is a good starter kit. I wouldn't buy it again, nor recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit because I always wanted to make my own candles. This candle making kit looked like it had everything I needed and it definitely does. I am so pleased with it that I will be buying more scented oils and wax so that I can make candles as gifts this holiday season. Very nice kit.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner kit, not good end product
customer_reviews.text: The Scents it came with were leaking and the labels were rubbed off, you could no longer read which scent was which. The kit was a good starter kit for learning the logistics of candle making. The instructions were vague on how much wax, scent, etc. I burned my first yesterday, the wicks must be faulty in burns only the wax within 1/4" proximity from the wick, the candle burned out after 3-4hrs yet there is a ton of wax so there that cannot be used as wick is used up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Kit is ok but nothing impressive.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were not the greatest and were vague in areas where they should have been a little more precise (fragrance oil to wax ratio). The candles will sweat if they are not done properly. This isn’t a huge issue if you are just testing the waters for yourself. Kind of a bummer if you were intending to do them as a gift. The tins are nice, thick, and don’t appear to discolor when subjected to heat. The candle making “tools” are also pretty stout and seem like they would hold up to repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Skewk

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend-low quality wax
customer_reviews.text: Love the containers & scents included. You get a mini version of everything you need to make a candle. My complaint is with the actual wax... it sucks! It has a melting point of about 160F but starts to cloud and solidify around 140F making it impossible to pour at a lower temp. Because of this you'll get poor results like rough tops & holes in the wax. I wouldn't buy or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Uribe

customer_reviews.title: I got it to give as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this to give as a gift to my Grandma who is staying home due to the CVOID crap. She said it is amazing! The packaging was beautiful, and according to Gma everything inside was quality and beautiful as well. She said it was easy to use and helped her pass the time! She is giving them as gifts to her local friends :)
customer_reviews.author: amanda arnold

customer_reviews.title: Complete Kit
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to get into candle making as a new hobby but I dont know where to start. I dont know which items to buy and how to really do it. This kit is perfect for me. I got everything i need to start. Includes instructions too, thermometer and stainless pitcher. These things intimidated me and i thought i need a lot of instruments to start candle making, and that's true. But with this kit, I got enough and by the time im finished with this project, I will be able to decide if i wanna do more, then I can buy things separately in large amounts.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Horrific smell
customer_reviews.text: So I had bought a previous candle kit previous to this. I made 3 candles and gave the rest to my sister. I bought it from etsy and decided to buy this kit. The one start for the tins they're cute. The rest was cheap..color cheap, the smell of the oils horrific, the wax cheap the other wax I used was easy to clean off this one is messy and hard to come off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wicks were not included.
customer_reviews.text: My package did not come with wicks. We were having a virtual candle making party. Now I can’t have the party without my wicks.
customer_reviews.author: Nailah Malak

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: I have not made any candles with the kit yet, but I have made a lot of candles in the past, and I can tell from going through the kit that it has everything that you will need to make some nice scented jar candles. I received it as a gift, and will make the candles for gifts. It does seem to be a little short on the wax to make all six jar candles, but it is not difficult to get more wax if you need it. You will need it anyway to make more candles in additional containers or molds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had a blast making candles!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this kit as a party gift for my sisters guest at her bachelorette party and it was a hit! The ladies loved it. Wish there were instructions on how to clean the beaker after each use but other than that, it was pretty easier to figure out. Will recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: DFelder

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and wow! It's packaged beautifully. I was blown away with how much activity came in the set. I'm very impressed. My ONLY problem is that the instructions could be a little more detailed but I guess that's where youtube comes in handy. I can't wait to try it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Erdbrink

customer_reviews.title: Missing items!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is great. However, the package was missing the wicks and eyedroppers, which of course made it impossible to make! I’m glad I was using it myself and not gifting... I would have been so embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: I loved the packaging. As a beginner this kit is perfect. Includes everything you need to get started. Just wished the instructions were more detailed. Be aware that you will need a scale as you need to have a certain amount of wax for each candle. But luckily the melting tin had some measurements , so you are able to do some conversions to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Perez

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are too vague but we got it. Other than that it was a good quarantine project.
customer_reviews.author: MayaJ

customer_reviews.title: The Thermometer battery compartment and battery has corrosion all over it.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy until I took the thermometer out the packaging to test the temperature of my melted wax. The thermometer wasn't working so I checked the battery. The battery and where the battery sits has corrosion all over it. I'm highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eisha

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a fun quarantine project! I have been wanting to make candles for a while and this little set has it all! The scents included are nice and it was A easy to use kit! Very happy with the purchase and the tins are super cute
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Good kit for begginers or kids. I like. Larger candles with strong scents that fill the room. The scents are nice but not strong enough. Had to use half a bottle to one bag of bees wax to make the scent noticeable when burning. The pot and spoon are of good quality and will continue to use as are the wick holder's. Price is worth it just for the reusable tools and storage box.
customer_reviews.author: juliewhy

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit but weak aroma
customer_reviews.text: The kit is cute and has everything you need to make candles. I think instructions could be better but is not a big deal. The reason why I gave it 4 stars is because of the essential oils, they are really weak so even when I added a lot, at the time you burn the candle, it does not smell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, pretty and fun
customer_reviews.text: So nice!!! Everything you need in a pretty pretty box. So easy and fun. They go to great lengths for a nice presentation of product. And the candles turned out good for a first timer !!
customer_reviews.author: lisa hockin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: If you’re beginning homemade candlemaking this is definitely the perfect starter kit. It’s very simple to use the variety of scents smell great and I absolutely love the tins that come with the kit. I’m going to see if they make tins identical to the ones that came in the kit that’s how much I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and so much fun! I’ve wanted to get into candle making for a bit. Once you’ve made the first one, it’s simple from there on out. The only misleading instruction was to wait until the wax comes down to 55 Celsius before pouring it into the candle. The first one I made, I waited and it had already started to harden. I wait until 65C and it’s much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia MP

customer_reviews.title: First time candle maker
customer_reviews.text: Never made a candle before? Me either! But we did with this kit!! Pretty simple and kit has everything you need. Have fun and experiment!
customer_reviews.author: Chuchi*

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me for mother's day. I locked myself in my room all day making candles with my wax warmer. So much fun!! It comes with everything you need! Super easy to use. I've already made five candles and I still have another bag of beeswax!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Rainy day project
customer_reviews.text: I think that this kit is fine, and somewhat easy to use. I think that clean up is really quite a challenge though. My candles all smelled a little bit like the first scent I used.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! Worth the buy. It was for an independent teenager who wanted something to do during shelter in place. She was pleased with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: April Laue

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the wax get too hot!
customer_reviews.text: I love the kit, but the scents weren't my favorite however there were 2 that I liked. Just because I don't like them doesn't mean you won't! Very easy and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool set. Easy to use. Fun family night to do together. Great for all ages. Smells amazing. Great quality and price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, but wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I think the kit and idea is lovely, but the instructions were a little TOO simple. I had to google a few things to understand. The scents were okay, but I will end up using my own instead next time. The whole thing just didn’t really do much for me and I was REALLY excited to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son in law as a gift.. he loves scented candles. Since my daughter is pregnant the candles make her sick so he can’t buy any hahaha.. so I found this and thought he can make candles that won’t make her sick. Best reaction ever... great project to with friends or at parties..
customer_reviews.author: olga heredia

customer_reviews.title: New hobby
customer_reviews.text: I spend a ton of money on candles, they're one of my favorite things. I decided to learn how to make them. This kit came with everything I needed. The instructions were easy to follow. I added more oils because I prefer more fragrant candles and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing items in order.
customer_reviews.text: The box is quality and the packaging was very beautiful however, I was missing things in the box that were supposed to come with it such as the stickers for the wicks. I did a little comment searching and apparently this happens often. 3 stars due to missing items but if it was a complete set I would of jumped to a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan smith

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it appears
customer_reviews.text: Three of my oils were open and spilled around styrofoam holder. So now they are half full and the labels cannot be read.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Spillage
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a higher rating but when I received it 3 of the 6 oils were spilled all over the Styrofoam that they came in, and the labels on them were unreadable.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Piper

customer_reviews.title: Good but Wicks are no good
customer_reviews.text: This is overall pretty good but please note that the wicks included are not strong enough for the containers. Meaning that you get serious tunneling and the wax doesn’t burn all the way to the edge.
customer_reviews.author: yasem morales

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, but it smells good
customer_reviews.text: So everything smells so good but I’m very upset that my package was very hot. The dye blocks were melted out of their packages and my wax dang near melted together and one of the scents leaked out and rubbed the print off all the bottles so I don’t know what is what 😢😢😢😢
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for gift!
customer_reviews.text: This a Christmas gift. Nice set to see if she needs a hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Not enough instructions
customer_reviews.text: The whole kit itself was perfect. However the instructions pamphlet was not very detailed. Being this is supposed to be for beginners it wasn’t very helpful. I had to research YouTube videos to get more details.
customer_reviews.author: Rayne Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wicks smell like petroleum
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this kit is a good learning kit. It has the basic materials that are necessary for candle making. Instructions could have been better, and you can tell the products are cheap. The wicks smell like petroleum when they burn, which makes me think they are dipped in some synthetic material.
customer_reviews.author: Monique DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this set 4 stars because although everything is included in the kit, the directions are horrible and missing key information. Also! The kit shows spearmint will be a fragrance... instead of spearmint I received peppermint. Mixed emotions about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let it burn
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Comes with everything you would need. I would just buy different scent the ones it came with aren't very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mayys

customer_reviews.title: fun activity
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kit. I am in quarantine and it’s a very fun activity to keep me entertained. it comes with a lot of wax and different smells. They smell really good. The containers are very colorful and provide a nice addition to any room
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to make memories
customer_reviews.text: Super fun craft to do with my kids. They loved it and it was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Making beautiful candles.
customer_reviews.text: This candle making kit it's wonderful I love it want to buy a second one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: lacheryl. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun!  Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter loved this! She made the candles by herself! She loves diy crafts!
customer_reviews.author: Martha J. Gosney

customer_reviews.title: The scent is not too good.
customer_reviews.text: The frangances are cheap and they don't smell much different from each other.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Montes

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheaply made and scents are not for young people
customer_reviews.text: Candle set was very cute and my daughter loved it. We however found that the scents did not match with the labels on the cans and the melting jar leaked all over the burner. It leaks from the handle connection.
customer_reviews.author: Charmander

customer_reviews.title: Good for learning
customer_reviews.text: I loved this purchase but the only thing i can say is that the scent wasn’t to strong. Was only able to smell if I was close to the candle.
customer_reviews.author: Tayygrovee

customer_reviews.title: So good so far
customer_reviews.text: It only came with 5 candle dye’s and not 6 like it said, it came with only with 6 glue dots, I did t get the full 10 like it said . I’m ready to try it and test it out and give it a try !
customer_reviews.author: Reggilicka lassiter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Candle Making Gift Set
customer_reviews.text: The presentation of the gift box and all the items contained within is outstanding. Everything that is needed to begin candle making is included, as well as an instruction booklet. I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS GIFT SET!
customer_reviews.author: Sbonds23

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little kit. I teach a Creativity 101 class for 3 eighth grade girls, and they loved this. I honestly can’t think of anything I’d change about this kit.
customer_reviews.author: E. Evertz

customer_reviews.title: Missing items from kit
customer_reviews.text: I was missing several items out of the kit.... the 6 stirring rods and the 2 wick stabilizers. This was my first attempt at making candles.
customer_reviews.author: DSTDiva

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again!! For what you get and the outcome not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette Baboolal

customer_reviews.title: I reall would have liked to keep the set in its original packaging
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a gift and everything inside the box seemed fine but the gift box and delivery box were all broken up. I will have to take everything out of the gift box and put it into a gift bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Eh. A couple of things. For $50 I expected more. My kit was missing the glue dots for the wicks. The instructions on how to make the candles are not specific on the quantities you have to use. Kind of frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Comes with everything you need to start making candles!
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit for candles
customer_reviews.text: It takes some practice but this kit is a great starter package. The directions are decent but there are several videos on the internet to help you get going. The learning curve is short.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn’t come with a cotton wick!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product came in fast, fragrance are smelling so good.... but mine didn’t come with a cotton wick! Not even one!! It’s so frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Jaydee Agcaoili

customer_reviews.title: Wrong apartment
customer_reviews.text: Love my order. The only complaint I have is that the package was left at the wrong apt. I’m glad my neighbor noticed it or I probably would be searching for my items.
customer_reviews.author: Keitra

customer_reviews.title: Ro make sure your getting your moneys worth
customer_reviews.text: I was missing two of the items for this package including a instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Missing products
customer_reviews.text: The glue dots and 2 colors were missing. Two of the essential oils bottles leaked all over the inside of the box and in the foam.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift for someone or for yourself!!  Should be fun  on  a blustery cold day.
customer_reviews.text: A birthday gift for my 20 year old granddaughter. She loved it too
customer_reviews.author: Jodie L Ganoe

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: This was awful. The products and tools were cheap and the oils smelled so bad I had to remove the candles from my home.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Henry

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity
customer_reviews.text: Nice fragrance and fun activity. Also Great for the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Saria Pathan

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and easy to use for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set for a beginner. Easy to understand step by step instructions. Would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Flores

customer_reviews.title: Whole set
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday and made my first candle today. It was easy and came out great
customer_reviews.author: Domonique

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Aromatherapy candles are non-toxic and harmless, you can design your own DIY, especially practical, you can give it away.
customer_reviews.author: gina fiske

customer_reviews.title: I love the book and the smell
customer_reviews.text: I like how the candle items all came in and the thermometer and it was just a neatest thing to have
customer_reviews.author: Christel wooden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for first time candle makers
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged beautifully! Comes with everything you need to start off making some candles.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Missing and leaked items
customer_reviews.text: One of The oils leaked in the package. The glue dots were missing
customer_reviews.author: katy shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Terrible oils for scenting the candles
customer_reviews.text: The oils that come with this are trash! 🤢 Threw them away and used my own.
customer_reviews.author: cherish6

customer_reviews.title: Wooden tongue repressor instead of metal wick holder
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap kit. Gave wooden tongue depresses instead of metal wick holders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better directions
customer_reviews.text: The directions could be more in depth but everything else is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: incomplete kit!
customer_reviews.text: INCOMPLETE KIT! Cute but does me no good without the wicks! Thanks alot
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages with supervision
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted to make my own candles butt I didn't have a clue where to begin, so I thought I might try this and wouldn't you know it. It exceeded all my expectations. Came with absolutely everything a person needs including a nice box to keep everything in. So now I can repurchase the stuff too make more once I run out. It's perfect for anyone's who knows nothing about making candles. It's wonderfully simple to follow instructions make it a breeze to enjoy oneself or with someone else being creative and productive. Great gift idea for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Vjensen

customer_reviews.title: Kit works, beware the listing photos though...
customer_reviews.text: Based on the description, you do receive the items... However, with the items that are pictured in the listing are likely not what you actually receive. The wax colors for coloring your candle came in blocks, not small pellets, and are pretty dried out. And we do not have metal wick holders... What came was popsicle sticks with holes in them. Other than that, everything is there and it’s totally usable. They made decent candles.
customer_reviews.author: VIVID_VINYL

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: This was such a fun little project. The instructions are easy, can do without it too. Everything are well packed and neat. I made 2 of green and pink. The scented oils are synthetic btw. I used my own real essential oils for a better and non toxic scent.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Shu

customer_reviews.title: Fun DIY with kids
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to entertain my little nephew to get involved with some fun DIY project and this is perfect. Buying a candle is simple but an ability to make one of your own is priceless. The outcome wasn’t as professional would do but it is a great learning experience. I would buy for gift if the packaging can be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: It is a great starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: This candle kit comes with everything you need to make candles. If you follow the instructions you will make beautiful smelling candles. When smelling the 6 scent I used coffee in-between so I could get the true smell, they smell amazing. I really like the lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Teffany

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool kit!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing, the only thing that I wish is that the instructions were a little better. The instructions are very vague. Nevertheless, I still love it and think it deserves 5 stars despite of the instructions or lack there of.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful kit....easy and fun making candles.
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything you’ll need to put together, liked scents and comes with different colors. Colors were a great touch to my new candles also liked the tin jars container look so beautiful. I really like this kit, I always wanted to try to make candles this makes everything easy and Fun activity. This is a really nice set for a beginner. Easy to understand step by step instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Mishal p Ali

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: This is great for beginners to get practice but I wouldn't recommend this if your wanting to start a candle making buissness doesn't have a big scent through and just smells like cheap wax
customer_reviews.author: shanice

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Beautiful cannisters and durable craft box for storage. My grandaughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: boolagirl

customer_reviews.title: Candle making DIY
customer_reviews.text: Not kid friendly but with parental assistance, can definitely get the job done. The candle holders heat up after filling with wax.. be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive whole kit.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this kit and half of the things that were supposed to be included were not. All I received was the wax, temperature gage, scents and containers. No wicks or anything. Very disappointed that I can’t even use this without having to buy more supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good
customer_reviews.text: Great product but my eucalyptus oil leaked all over the inside of the packaging. Nothing else was damaged and I have other eucalyptus oil at home so it’s a little irritating but not worth the hassle of shipping it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Okarski

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun! This set includes all the tools you need to make beautiful scented candles. The instructions were clear and very easy to follow
customer_reviews.author: volleygirl

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love It! Super Easy To Use! Had Lots Of Fun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a girlfriends weekend and love that the kit has everything all in one!!
customer_reviews.author: Shani R Crosby

customer_reviews.title: You dont get eveything in the box
customer_reviews.text: I oredered it twice..still didnt get the spoon and center things
customer_reviews.author: Rick

product_meta.title: YINUO LIGHT Scented Candle Making Kit DIY Gift Set
feature_bullets: Our Candle Making Kit has everything you need to make your own scented candles.
We want your candles to look, smell and burn like those expensive high-end shop candles. That's why we source only top-quality ingredients, pure fragrances, and sturdy tools that are easy to use.
No experience necessary! Our simple, step-by-step instructions will guide you through the whole process.
MORE THAN JUST A GIFT, it's a brand new hobby. Get it for your loved ones - they will love making their own candles.
RISK FREE -- LOVE IT OR YOUR MONEY BACK. 100% Satisfaction guarantee.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars470 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
